vaccine-not-recognised.en: Only vaccines registered with, and recognised by the EMA are allowed.

vaccine-not-accepted.en: Only certain vaccines that are approved by the EMA or the WHO are accepted.

course-not-completed.en: The vaccination course should be completed.

vaccination-before-today.en: Date of vaccination must be before the current date.

delay-time-not-yet-elapsed.en: The delay time for this vaccine since this vaccination has not elapsed yet.

vaccination-not-too-old.en: Vaccination should not be too long ago.

vaccination-no-longer-valid.en: Vaccination is too long ago, and is no longer valid.
